Related repos

  • An online image compression tool with local processing
  • Upscales images across platforms
  • benchmark dataset for image complexity assessment
  • Diffusion transformer for image generation with sub-second latency
  • browser-based inpainting and image upscaling powered by webgpu and wasm
  • Speeds up video and image diffusion models by caching computations, no retraining needed
  • Optimizes images in the browser without data leaving the device
  • inpainting and outpainting for images and video using any diffusion model
  • AI tool that turns pixelated faces into realistic high-res images using StyleGAN
